inn1.comm: drifting on the pads, warm-up delivery by Mortaza, tucked away to the on side
fullish outside off, swinging in, driven off the front foot to mid-off
Mortaza picks up a bit of pace, Pitcher nudges it to third man
Mortaza bowls that on middle and leg, tucked off the pads for no run
short of a length and Outerbridge defends solidly off the back-foot
first blood to Mortaza, dug in short, Outerbridge was tempted into the hook, the ball catches the top edge and goes straight down the throat of Mohammad Rafique at fine leg
inswing onto the pads, Pitcher turns it to square leg, takes off for a risky run but make his ground, beating the throw
off cutter, defended off the backfoot back to the bowler
hint of awy swing, driven confidently off the front foot towards covers
driven firmly off the front foot but he finds the fielder at point
Rasel drifts towards the body, working up some inswing, tucked off the pads
Border plays too early and gets a leading edge which nearly carries to Rasel
good length outside off, steered towards point
ball darts in from off stump, Pitcher tucks it off his pads and sets off for a risky run, makes it in time
off cutter, Borden decides to gauge the movement and bounce, lets it go
wide down the leg side over the batsmen, Mortaza striving for more pace
attempted off drive, manages to edge it onto his pads and the ball rolls to the off side
fullish length, defended off the front foot
width offered and Borden slashes at it, gets the outside edge and flies past third slip, third man does the fielding
flicked towards fine leg
streaky shot, Pitcher gets a little room to play with outside off stump, swishes and misses it completely
beaten again, this time Rasel pitches it a little short and Pitcher slashes hard at it
and again! Rasel digs it in, Pitcher gets closer to the ball and nearly gets an outside edge
Rasel pitches it fuller, Pitcher gets a lot of bat on it but doesnt time it well enough, plays to the off side
good length outside off, Pitcher defends off the front foot
Pitcher steers it towards point but finds the fielder
Mortaza strikes again, good length on middle at a gentle pace, Borden shapes to play on the on side, ends up getting a leading edge, Habibul Bashar at mid-off takes a dolly
beaten! Mortaza bowls a teaser in the channel outside off, Pitcher wafts at it but withdraws his bat
straight delivery on the pads, Pitcher clips it off his pads towards square leg
Mortaza maintains the straight line, Pitcher pushes it firmly to mid-on
beaten! Pitcher was drawn into another waft just outside off, nearly gets the edge to Mushfiqur
beatenh again, this one sliced Pitcher in half but Mortaza overstepped, the ball clips the pads to the keeper
beaten again! that was a jaffa, overpitched, it swung away after pitching and Pitcher nearly edged it while trying to drive off the front foot
Hemp faces up with ease, defends it off the backfoot to the on side
plenty of awy swing for Rasel, Hemp watches it through to the keeper
Rasel makes him play, Hemp pushes it towards the cover region
now Rasel joins the party! away-swinger, outside off stump, Hemp cuts and hits it straight to Aftab Ahmed at backward point, it wasn't the best delivery but Bangladesh will take it
beaten, Rasel draws Romaine forward to a delivery that shaped away
this time Romaine middles it but ends up turning it off his pads straight to midwicket
pacy delivery outside off, a touch wide and swinging away, Romaine decides to let it go
Romaine nicely gets his bat behind it and defends off the backfoot
dug in short, Romaine goes for the pull but mistimes it, cries of catch it as the ball rolls to Razzak at square leg
short and over the batsman's head, wide rightly called
short of a good length, Romaine defends off the backfoot to mid-on
awayswinger from Mortaza, Romaine watches it through carefully to the keeper, the pressure's on
slower ball. leg cutter, Romaine is beaten but the ball carries to the keeper off one bounce
full and wide, Pitcher throws the kitchen sink at it and misses it completely
defended off the front foot, played with more control this time
confidently steered off the pads by Pitcher past midwicket, the rain has started again
wide outside off and in the slot to drive, Pitcher drives hard to mid-off, rain getting heavier

wide again and Pitcher gets a thickish outside edge which flies towards third man who had to run a few yards to his right to cut that off, optimistic shouts of 'catch it' but the ball landed in the middle of nowhere
Rasel drifts towards the pads and Romaine tucks it away easily towards fine leg
fired in quickly through  the air, driven towards deep cover
marginally short of a length outside off, punched to the bowler off the backfoot
straight delivery, tucked off the hips to the on side
lovely turn there, tossed up on middle and the batsman was squared up by the spin, beaten
struck high on the pads, optimistic shout
turned away towards midwicket off the backfoot
off cutter, Pitcher chases at a wide delivery outside off, lucky not to get an edge
overpitched outside off, Pitcher makes solid contact and the ball scorches away to the point fence, that should break the shackles
good comeback, change of pace, Pitcher plays a little too early and is beaten
Rasel slips it down leg, awry line this time,, Pitcher tries to pull it but doesnt time it well, the ball rolls towards square leg
swing and a miss, Romaine chases a wide delivery but doesnt make any contact as his feet are rooted to the crease
beaten, Rasel fires it with good pace, Romaine shows his bat at it and withdraws
full and straight, Pitcher tries to glide it, to third man but it looked risky
Pitcher nearly drags it back onto his stumps trying to cut
steps down the track and carts it wide of mid-off
quick and slightly wide, Romaine tries to cut but misses
hit on the front pad on the forward defensive, appeal turned down
full and despatched straight past the bowler, Romaine gets his high backlift down and drives well through the line, Razzak can barely get a hand to it
Razzak gets it spot on! tossed up on off stump, Romaine is a little late on the forward defense, gets hit on the front pad bang in line of off and middle stump, easy decision for umpire Davis
driven hard but straight to cover
drifts on the pads, turned towards long leg, we're in the second Powerplay
flighted on off stump, defended to cover
steered towards point
rafique drops it short and Minors shifts his weight on the backfoot and pulls it along the ground to midwicket
swept towards short fine leg
cut away and well fielded by Saqibul Hassan at point, diving to his left, the powerplays are over
over the wicket to the left hander, Minors turns it to the on side and picks up and easy single
tossed up around middle and leg, Pitcher turns it to short fine leg and turns down the single
steered towards point
Pitcher gets forward and steers it to point again
flighted on the stumps, Pitcher defends back to the bowler
a bit of width outside off, Minors cuts and finds the gap past short third man, Tamim does the chasing
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
fullish and driven straight to mid-on
fullish again, Minors turns his wrists and places it towards fine leg
steered towards point, the drizzle has started again
watchfully defended off the front foot
pushed back to the bowler
flicked away with the turn to the on side, Minors trying to rotate the strike
tossed up around middle and leg, Pitcher pushes it to Aftab at midwicket
attempted slog sweep, the ball rolls towards short  fine leg
defended off the backfoot towards midwicket
pushed towards backward point for a quick single
tossed up outside off, defended off the backfoot to backward point, well the rain returns!
tossed up and Pitcher drives in the air forcefully towards long-off
quicker one, Minors tries to cut but misses, Bermuda need some quick runs here
fired on the pads and Minors sweeps
Pitcher advances down the track but ends up driving along the ground to long-on
steered towards deep point, batsmen contemplate a second  but decide against it as the first run wasnt quick enough
pushed back to the bowler
Dropped Minors tries to slog with the turn, gets a top edge and Ashraful at deep square leg drops a sitter
Pitcher steps down the track and picks up an easy two past midwicket
fabulous catch! Pitcher steps down and mistimes it, the ball is skied past the infield towards sweeper cover and Bashar takes it brilliantly running backwards, tumbling in the process
overthrows, results in a second run
nudged towards backward point
pushed to the off side
good stump-to stump line by Aftab, pushed back to the bowler
tries to pull, Cann gets an underedge and the ball goes between the keepers legs towards fine leg
overpitched, in the slot and Cann deposits that way over midwicket and the ball lands in the top tier
width offered on the off side, Cann gives room and finds the backward point fence
slower ball, Cann slogs over midwiicket, one bounce four
pushed wirh soft hands towards the bowler, quick single taken, Saqibul fires it back to the keeper but Cann was back in time, excellent running!
Cann goes for another heave but Saqibul outfoxes him with his flight, Cann plays all around it and is bowled
quicker, turned to the on side
heaved away towards deep midwicket and a brilliant save cuts off at least two runs
Tucker makes room even before the bowler approches the crease, Saqibul slips in in slower, Tucker manages to find the fielder at cover who dives to his right
Tucker gives room again, whacks it to long-off
on middle and leg, Minors pushes it to long-on
scooped to deep cover and Rasel makes a valiant attempt at catching that, diving forward
Tucker gives room and the outside edge flies towards third man boundary, who was brought forward
fired on middle and leg, Tucker slogs, the ball flies towards long leg who takes a well judged catch, bangaldesh have been very quick on the field
flighted on off, Hurdle is rooted to the crease and swings and misses
flat on off stump, swept towards square leg
fired in on the pads, Hurdle swings but fails to connect, the ball hits the pads and rolls to the on side
flat and short, Minors waits on it and biffs it over square leg for a huge six
Minors steps down, was beaten in flight , doesnt get the desired elevation and hits it down long-on's throat. Tamim takes an easy catch
Hurdle swings and misses, a valuable dot ball that
Hurdle fails to get bat on ball again, Razzak fires it in on off stump, no turn, Hurdle attempts another slog and his off stump is flattened

inn2.comm: inswinger on the pads, Tamim turns it to the on-side for an easy single
Hurdle digs it in short but gets the direction wrong, down the leg side
short and on the batsman's body, Nafees gets it on the gloves and does well to keep it down
Hurdle gets the radar wrong again and slips it way down leg
and another....Hurdle slips it down leg, these are bonus runs for Bangladesh
good comeback, Hurdle gets it outside the off stump, cramps Nafees for room
now an overstep to complicate it, pushed back to the bowler
hit on the pads while trying to work it away on the on side, appeal turned down, plenty of inswing, the ball may have missed leg
that one jags back in after pitching and catches Nafees on the pads, optimistic shout but was struck outside the line
gets it on target with the stumps, Nafees gets forward and defends
superb catch! Tamim steps down, gets the top edge over point and Hurdle, after a n unimpressive first over charges from third man, runs towards deep point and pulls off a stunner, with both hands
Mukuddem pitches up outside off, draws Nafees onto the drive, beaten
beaten! Mukkudem holds the length back outside off, Nafees pokes at it and is beaten
another jaffa! Mukuddem cramps Nafees for room again, this time the ball very nearly gets the edge
Mukuddem loses his radar and slips it down leg
left alone outside off to the keeper
Mukuddem gets his line right outside off, the ball shapes away after pitching, left alone
beaten! Aftab gets squared up by the pace and movement
Bangladesh seem to be feeding on extras here, Aftab tries to tuck it away on the on side and gets struck on the pads
Aftab loses patienc, steps down, swings and misses
Hurdle digs it short, Aftab tries to hook but mistimes it, the ball rolls to the on side
comes in after pitching, defended confidently by Nafees off the back foot
Hurdle striving for that extra yard  of pace, oversteps again
fullish, swinging in around off, Nafees pushes it to mid-off
short and Nafees packs a pounch with that one, pulling it with disdain over the square  leg ropes
swing and a miss! Aftab goes for a mightly heave but doesnt get to the pitch of the ball
short of a length and cutting in, Aftab steers it to point
neatly tucked away off the hips towards square leg
fuller, Aftab drives uppishly and beats the diving mif-off
struck high on the pads, superb in-dipper by Mukuddem
fullish and waiting to be spanked over the off side, Aftab plays away from his body and ends up underedging it to midwicket
Hurdle gets that one to jag back in after pitching, Nafees adjusts well, plays it down with soft hands and takes off for a single
Aftab steps down, plays it down to the off side and sets off for a risky run, sent back by Nafees
steps down, thick outside edge flies to third man
Nafees tries to swing across the line and gets hit on the pads, down leg so chance of a leg before
off cutter, driven back to the bowler
Hurdle gets his direcdtion wrong and drifts down leg
defended off the backfoot towards cover
Mukuddem gets his off cutters to trouble Aftab again, pushed back to the bowler
Aftab goes for a heave over the on side, the ball misses the stumps by a whisker, four streaky runs
Mukuddem gets his man! Aftab plays with the line, misses it, the ball clips his front pad in line with the off stump, Mukuddem goes up in appeal
how did that miss? pitching on middle, shaping away, Hasan was completely squared up with the late movement, beaten all ends up
Hasan chases a wide one outside off, lucky not to get a feather on that
defended off the backfoot
Nafees tries to tuck it off his pads, gets struck on the pads but the late inswing averts a leg before dismissal
outside off, nafees tries to glide it past third man, finds the fielder at gully
turned away towards the on side for an easy single
another extra! Hurdle slips this one down leg
now he goes on the off side, too wide for Saqibul to make contact
how did that miss again?! good length on off stump, shaping in, Saqibul misses and the ball misses the top of off stump by a whisker
attempted off drive, under edge to the on side
full and wide outside off, Nafees leans onto it, connects, the ball is cut off just before it reaches the ropes, good commitment
and Mukuddem strikes again! a shaky Nafees tries to turn it off his pads on the on side, succeeds in getting a leading edge to Tucker at second slip. This is getting interesting here!
low full toss, Ashraful gets forward and pushes it gently to mid-on
outside edge, Saqibul edges to third man, safe shot in the end
direction wrong again, Ashraful lets one go wide outside off stump
and another, Mukuddem finding it hard to control the swing, slips down leg
too close to cut, Ashraful doesnt get the desired room to play it square and cuts it to third man
fullish, driven off the front foot to cover
beaten! Mukuddem tempts Saqibul into the drive, misses the outside edge, confident appeal from behind
played with soft hands, cheeky single taken, both bowler and keeper were undecided as to who should go for it
pushed back to the bowler, gentle pace there
Tucker bowls to the stumps, gets the ball to swing in to the left hander, Saqibul plays to the on side
full and driven to mid-on, quick single taken
short and a trifle wide, Ashraful opens the face of the bat and helps it across to third man
fullish outside off, driven to short cover
Mukuddem gets it to dip in after pitching, Ashraful watches it through to the keeper
Ashraful drops it down to the off side with soft hands, sets off for a run, good running
steps down the track, doesnt get to the pitch of it and hence mistimes it, the ball lands a few yards before the boundary behind the bowler
drifting on the body, Ashraful turns it with ease to fine leg
edged! somehow that sneaks between second slip and gully, third man does the fielding
left alone to the keeper
full and swinging in , the pace is too slow though and Sakib had enough time to run down the track and drive to mid-off
huge shout for lbw. Going down leg side. Landed on the middle stump line, slided in and Ashraful had a swing across the line. Poor stroke. A billion Indians would have gone up in appeal as well!

Almost caught!  Pure drama. Full and on the middle, Ashraful went for a lofted stroke - another risky shot, the adrenalin must be kicking in- and it floated behind mid-on. Pitcher was slow to react, turned, ran behind and even threw in a dive but it just eluded him. Bangladeshi fans would have sighed in relief, Indian fans would have been left muttering .....
leg cutter, no pace at all, pushed back to the bowler
steered to the off side and they sneak another single
pushed to gully, Saqbul sets off for a run, sent back, scampers back hom
Dropped, poor delivery, pulled away, no elevation, short mkidwicket gets his fingertips to it
defended on the backfoot to short  midwicket
flicked away off the pads to fine leg, easy two
attempted slog, Saqibul doesnt get to the pitch and misses, gets his foot back in time to avert a stumping
turned away to deep square leg for a single
pushed back to the bowler, no pace to work with
Saqibul gets on his knees and carts it over midwcket, doesnt find the gap though
turned to square leg, Ashraful runs the first one hard and scampers back for the second
tried to cut off the backfoot, ended up missing it altogether
delicately nudged to third man, despairing dive but the ball beats him
tries to play across the line on his knees, gets an underedge  onto the pads
tries to cut, gets the bottom edge and the ball rolls to the left of Minors
driven forcefully off the front foot towards long-off
tries to dab it to third man, first slip stops it
steps down and lofts over long-on
overthrows! Leverock fails to gather the ball at the stumps, results in an extra single
pushed back to the bowler
gets on his knees, easily picked away from outside off to the midwicket boundary
turned to the on side, no run there
big turn from middle to off, Saqibul plays away from his body and chops it down to the off side
sloppy stuff, down leg and Minors can't get a hand to it, bonus runs
misfield, this time it's Leverock at cover, some slumped shoulders in the Bermuda camp there
turns it to the on side, Minors runs across and nearly effects and run-out at the strikers end
pushed back to the bowler with ease
steered away with ease to the on side, easy single there
sweep, gets the top edge but luckily for Saqibul, it fall short of short fine leg
uses his feet, plays with the line to the off side
left alone, watchfully though
fullish outside off, Ashraful drives it square
loosener on the pads, tucked away weith ease to the on side
Saqibul steps down the track and hits it to the vacant mid-off region
pushed down the ground past the bowler for another easy run
Saqibul defends on the front foot, Minors claims a catch, the umpires refer it. Replays showed that the ball bounced twice to Minors..hmmm..one of the easier decisions for the third umpire
short and pulled easily to midwicket for an easy run
down leg side, another wide in the extras clumn
cut away but straight to point
turned away with ease towards the short fine leg region
and that's the passport to the Super Eights for Bangladesh! Saqibul Hasan steps down the track lofts over mid-on for a boundary, Man aren't the Bangladeshis delighted!
